column1: # This file contains the transportation options to reach the ski resorts
# from various towns in the Valais plain.
# Note: Price for cablecar might be included in the ski pass so it might differ for some
# The Walk time on arrival is included in the duration

column12: I remove it because les masses is closer
Not in sbb, because navette is not there
Bus direct also available but slower
There is also a navette mandatory or 30 min walk
Only the Navette goes to the ski domain, and it is not synched the bus
Walk 20 min or take the shuttle
Not optimal compared to the bus to Bürchen
Once there you can take a small train next to the station, or walk/navette to other lifts
